In England, in the seven days to 29 August, there were 171,166 new confirmed cases (302.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 August, there were 188,106 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (16,940 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 September is 5,964,760 (10,547.7 cases per 100,000 population).
